channel.title: interactive visualization on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in interactive visualization on Orange

item.title: Scatter Plots: the Tour
item.description: Scatter plots are surely one of the best loved visualizations in Orange. Very often, when we teach, people go back to scatter plots over and over again to see their data. We took peopleâ€™s love for scatter plots to the heart and we redesigned them a bit to make them even more friendly. Our favorite still remains the Informative Projections button. This button helps you find interesting visualizations from all the combinations of your data variables.
